message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV 

The paper deals with improving information retrieval using text classification techniques, which falls under the sub-category of Information Retrieval (cs.IR). Additionally, the paper also involves natural language processing (cs.CL), machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and computer vision (cs.CV) to some extent. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.IR, followed by cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, and cs.CV.
